root.name: The Muppets: On with the Show
root.description: Plot You are put in charge of an episode of the classic series. The entire cast and characters appear and they look to you to help with the show. You attempt to put together a great show by completing a set of mini games focusing on the Muppet's characters and personalities. GameplayThe game is broken up into eight different minigames and each focus's on iconic characters from the show. One game will put you in control of Kermit, who is floating down a river playing a banjo. The goal of this mini game is to avoid obstacles and make it down the river in one piece. The Swedish chef makes an appearance as he tries to rid his kitchen of Rizzo the rat. Some games resemble each other such as the Gonzo and Kermit levels. The Gonzo level puts you on a scooter with gameplay just like the Kermit river level. There ways to extend the gameplay in the Muppets. Two levels are actually locked away in the game, and you have to earn points on the other games to unlock them. There are also multiple difficulties to compete in, but the difficulties are usually kept simple enough for children to enjoy.
